comments:
1. create a new project, commit it
2. create a branch, DON'T elect to create a version, hit "Next>"
3. select "Merge".  In the first page of the wizard there will be no versions.  
Hit Next>.

When you get to the end and hit finish you will get the following NPE.  I 
assume "Next>" should be disabled in step 2 if no versions selected.
